title: Hainan Hot Spring Hideaway with Natural Hot Spring Swimming Pool
description: Discover the famous hot spring town Qionghai when you choose to stay at Holiday Inn Resort Qionghai Guantang, an IHG Hotel. If you seek some quiet time, take a dip in the tree-lined guitar-shaped outdoor swimming pool or head indoors for a healing soak in the natural hot springs swimming pool. At the Lobby bar, indulge in decadent desserts at afternoon tea, or pick and choose your next meal at any of the four onsite restaurants, most boasting panoramic views of the nearby mountain or lake.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Qionghai Guantang, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Baishi Ridge Scenic Zone, Guantang, Jiaji Town, Qionghai, Hainan, China, 571400
